30296.summary: Some customers in the North Western Brookswood area of Langley are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
30296.title: Dec 10 – Langley (North Western Brookswood) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
